titleStmt.title: Hell illuminated, or, Sancy's Roman Catholic confession wherein are such lessons, which if studiously practis'd, 'tis much to be fear'd, the Devil himself will turn Jesuit.
Confession catholique du sieur de Sancy. English
titleStmt.author: Aubigné, Agrippa d', 1552-1630.

notesStmt.note: Translation of Agrippa d'Aubigne's Confession catholique du sieur de Sancy.
Later issued under title: "The Catholik confession of Monsieur de Sancy."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
